On my inhibition when speaking

Jul 30, 2014 • aloneindecember

There was  a time where we could speak clear.
I used to tell you almost everything.
Words would flow from my brain to my mouth without a filter,
Now a big filter keeps me from even speaking,
mainly because I loved you. Sometimes because I was sad, happy or angry.
it is there to protect you, protect me, and because it has to be like this.
